name: bdopssadj

body.origin:
|- wss(cbo, cdm(cado))
-| wceq(cin(clo, ccop), cbo)
-| wss(cin(clo, ccop), cdm(cado))
body.pretty:
⊢ BndLinOp ⊆ dom(adjh)
⊣ (LinOp ⋂ ContOp)= BndLinOp
⊣ (LinOp ⋂ ContOp)⊆ dom(adjh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cbo, cdm(cado))
-| wceq(cin(clo, ccop), cbo)
-| wss(cin(clo, ccop), cdm(cado))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ BndLinOp ⊆ dom(adjh)
⊣ (LinOp ⋂ ContOp)= BndLinOp
⊣ (LinOp ⋂ ContOp)⊆ dom(adjh)

comment: Every bounded linear Hilbert space operator has an adjoint. (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
